Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the Long Island Power Authority and certain payments in lieu of taxes
Summary: Provides that payments in lieu of taxes subject to the two percent limit shall be calculated based upon the real property acquired by the authority in the aggregate in each municipality or school district and not on parcel by parcel basis.
LawCode: Amd ยง1020-q, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to certain payments in lieu of taxes
